longMSG:
You are in the kitchen on the 1st floor. 
 There is an island and a pantry.
 You may go...
    east to the dining room on the 1st floor through the kitchen door, or
    northwest to the garden through the back door.
shortMSG:
You are in the kitchen on the 1st floor. 
 Features: island, pantry
 Areas you may go to:
    east - kitchen door to dining room - 1st floor
    northwest - back door to garden - 1st floor
